car_data.name: Toyota Corolla
car_data.short_description: The Toyota Corolla is a reliable and fuel-efficient sedan, known for its spacious interior and comfortable ride. It's an ideal choice for daily commuting and family trips.

car_data.name: Toyota RAV4
car_data.short_description: The Toyota RAV4 is a compact SUV known for its reliability and off-road capability. It combines ruggedness with modern amenities for an enjoyable driving experience.

car_data.name: Toyota Camry
car_data.short_description: The Toyota Camry is a popular midsize sedan, offering a perfect blend of style, comfort, and efficiency. It's a great choice for various lifestyles.

car_data.name: Toyota Prius
car_data.short_description: The Toyota Prius is a groundbreaking hybrid car known for its exceptional fuel economy and environmental friendliness. It's a pioneer in green technology.

car_data.name: Honda CR-V
car_data.short_description: The Honda CR-V is a versatile SUV with ample cargo space and advanced safety features. It offers a smooth and comfortable ride for both city and off-road adventures.

car_data.name: Honda Civic
car_data.short_description: The Honda Civic Hatchback is a sporty and efficient compact car, perfect for urban driving. It offers a well-designed interior and excellent fuel economy.

car_data.name: Honda Accord
car_data.short_description: The Honda Accord is a well-rounded midsize sedan, known for its comfortable ride and quality interior. It's a favorite among family-oriented drivers.

car_data.name: Honda Fit
car_data.short_description: The Honda Fit is a versatile subcompact car that maximizes interior space. It's perfect for city life and provides great maneuverability.

car_data.name: Ford Mustang
car_data.short_description: The Ford Mustang is an American classic known for its powerful V8 engine and iconic design. It delivers a thrilling driving experience with a touch of nostalgia.

car_data.name: Ford Escape
car_data.short_description: The Ford Escape is a compact SUV that combines style and functionality. It's designed for urban adventurers and offers a comfortable ride.

car_data.name: Ford Fusion
car_data.short_description: The Ford Fusion is a midsize sedan that balances style and practicality. It's known for its comfortable seats and advanced tech features.

car_data.name: Ford Focus
car_data.short_description: The Ford Focus is a compact hatchback offering a fun-to-drive experience with responsive handling. It's a great choice for city dwellers.

car_data.name: Chevrolet Impala
car_data.short_description: The Chevrolet Impala is a spacious and comfortable sedan with a focus on technology and safety. It's perfect for those seeking a blend of style and practicality.

car_data.name: Chevrolet Suburban
car_data.short_description: The Chevrolet Suburban is a full-size SUV with abundant passenger and cargo space. It's a great choice for large families and long road trips.

car_data.name: Chevrolet Malibu
car_data.short_description: The Chevrolet Malibu is a midsize sedan with a smooth ride and a comfortable interior. It offers excellent fuel efficiency for everyday use.

car_data.name: Chevrolet Spark
car_data.short_description: The Chevrolet Spark is a compact hatchback designed for city living. It's small in size but big on features, making it easy to park and maneuver.

car_data.name: BMW 3 Series
car_data.short_description: The BMW 3 Series is a luxury sedan that combines performance with refinement. It offers a premium driving experience and cutting-edge technology.

car_data.name: BMW X5
car_data.short_description: The BMW X5 is a luxury SUV that offers a spacious and upscale interior. It's designed for those who want both performance and luxury in one package.

car_data.name: BMW 5 Series
car_data.short_description: The BMW 5 Series is a luxury sedan that sets the standard for elegance and performance. It offers a balance of power, comfort, and advanced technology.

car_data.name: BMW 2 Series
car_data.short_description: The BMW 2 Series is a compact luxury coupe that delivers sporty performance and a stylish design. It's perfect for those who love driving.

car_data.name: Tesla Model 3
car_data.short_description: The Tesla Model 3 is an electric sedan that redefines sustainability and innovation. It features cutting-edge autopilot capabilities and impressive electric range.

car_data.name: Tesla Model Y
car_data.short_description: The Tesla Model Y is an all-electric compact SUV that offers both performance and versatility. It combines an electric powertrain with modern tech features.

car_data.name: Tesla Model S
car_data.short_description: The Tesla Model S is a premium electric sedan with unmatched acceleration and a futuristic interior. It's a leader in the electric car revolution.

car_data.name: Tesla Model X
car_data.short_description: The Tesla Model X is a high-performance electric SUV with distinctive Falcon Wing doors and a spacious, high-tech interior. It's a marvel of electric engineering.
